text: Voxel art is a digital art form which is similar to pixel art. Instead of coloring squares, cubes are colored. Voxel art is especially popular in revamps of old video games, and also in Minecraft and other cube sandboxes. Voxel art is made with special software called a voxel editor. == Other websites == * https://www.megavoxels.com/2019/11/what-is-voxel-art.html Category:Art
title: Voxel art
